SEARCH
Package mru.tsc.model

Class Figure

java.lang.Object
mru.tsc.model.Toy
mru.tsc.model.Figure
public class Figure extends Toy
The Figure class represents a figure-type toy in the Toy Store system. It extends the Toy class and adds an extra attribute called classification, which identifies the kind of figure (for example, Action, Doll, or Historic). This class helps organize toys that fall under the “Figure” category and provides methods to easily access, display, or format their information.
Since:
2025-11-09
Version:
1.0
Author:
Alexander Yoseph, Lorenzo Sta Maria, Haseeb Ullah

    • classification

      private char classification

  • Constructor Details

    • Figure

      public Figure(String serialNum, String name, String brand, double price, int count, int age, char classification)
      Creates a new Figure object and fills in all its details. It also calls the superclass constructor to set the common toy information.
      Parameters:
      serialNum - the unique serial number of the toy
      name - the name of the toy
      brand - the toy’s brand name
      price - the price of the toy
      count - how many of this toy are available in stock
      age - the recommended age for the toy
      classification - the toy’s classification — 'A' for Action, 'D' for Doll, or 'H' for Historic

  • Method Details

    • getClassification

      public char getClassification()
      Gets the toy’s classification type.
      Returns:
      the classification character ('A', 'D', or 'H')

    • setClassification

      Updates the toy’s classification type.
      Parameters:
